【Dual Control Focusing System】Microscope features both coarse and fine focus knobs. The coarse focus knob quickly locates the image on the stage, while the fine focus knob maintains precise clarity, ensuring details are sharp and well-defined. Enjoy a clear and focused view of your specimens with ease

name: Compound Binocular Microscope for Adults, Professionals & Kids, 40X-2000X Magnification with LED Illumination, Mechanical Stage, WF2x & WF25x Eyepieces，Compatible for Lab, School, Home Education
short_description: 【PROFESSIONAL 40X-2000X MAGNIFICATION】 This compound binocular microscope offers a powerful magnification range from 40X to 2000X, perfect for viewing intricate details of biological slides, cells, and other specimens. Equipped with WF10x and WF25x widefield eyepieces along with achromatic objectives, it delivers a remarkably clear and sharp image, making it an ideal microscope for adults professional and advanced student use.

【DUAL LED ILLUMINATION FOR SUPERIOR CLARITY】 Experience brilliant illumination with our dual LED light microscope system. The upper incident light is perfect for observing opaque objects like coins and leaves, while the lower transmitted light excels with transparent samples on slides. The intensity of each LED is independently adjustable, providing optimal lighting for any application and ensuring a crystal-clear view every time.

【PRECISE COAXIAL FOCUSING & MECHANICAL STAGE】 Achieve pinpoint accuracy with smooth coaxial coarse and fine focusing knobs. The large double-layer mechanical stage with scale markings allows you to secure slides and navigate them precisely with effortless control. This professional-grade feature ensures you can easily track and examine specific areas of your sample without losing your place.

【BINOCULAR HEAD & USER-COMFORT DESIGN】 The 45-degree inclined binocular head reduces neck and eye strain during extended viewing sessions. The adjustable interpupillary distance provides a comfortable and single, sharp image for every user. This ergonomic design, combined with high-quality optics, makes our compound microscope a pleasure to use for education, hobbies, or detailed research work.

【COMPLETE KIT WITH PHONE CAMERA COMPATIBILITY】 This all-in-one microscope kit comes with everything you need to start exploring immediately. It's fully compatible with Mobile phone to capture images, record videos, and share your discoveries on Mobile phone. Perfect for students, hobbyists, and homeschooling, it’s the ultimate tool to unlock the wonders of the microscopic world.
